name: N-jimaWare
description:
N-jimaWare was created for 2021 Kiwijam game jam.

The game was made in 48 hours and had to revolve around the theme of "Adapt".

N-jimaWare is a collection of 8 microgames. The way it relates to "Adapt" is that the player must quickly adapt their own playstyle when playing the game, as some microgames require the mouse pointer. Some will use keyboard controls.

The 8 included microgames will cycle randomly until the player has successfully completed 100 of them without failing. All assets, code and premise were created by myself and thus it does look the way it does.

The game was developed using the Godot game engine.
